text:
SharpSpring.com | Gainesville, FL | Full Time | Onsite

Hiring System Administrator, frontend and backend developers (Javascript/PHP).

We are a publicly traded company that still feels and operates very much like a startup.

Our flagship product is our marketing analytics and automation platform, and our developers are provided an opportunity to work on a wide range of interesting projects.

Contact jennifer.hartman [at] sharpspring.com or visit http://smtp.theresumator.com/ for more info.
